
{{alias}}( n, x )
    Evaluates a normalized Hermite polynomial.

    Parameters
    ----------
    n: integer
        Non-negative polynomial degree.

    x: number
        Value at which to evaluate the polynomial.

    Returns
    -------
    y: number
        Function value.

    Examples
    --------
    > var y = {{alias}}( 1, 0.5 )
    0.5
    > y = {{alias}}( -1.0, 0.5 )
	NaN
	> y = {{alias}}( 0, 0.5 )
    1.0
	> y = {{alias}}( 2, 0.5 )
    -0.75

    See Also
    --------
